argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspsnsubg.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspsnsubg.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_lspsncl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_lsssubg | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( N ` { X } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
